name: ATC: Eurowings Airbus A320 Beautiful Approach and Landing into Manchester
description:
Approach and landing into Manchester onboard Eurowings Airbus A320 D-AEWD, operating flight EW1346 from Dusseldorf on July 29 2016.

Video taken from seat 8A

Full flight video: Coming soon


✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Cameras: 
Window footage: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Airport and onboard footage: GoPro Hero Session http://amzn.to/2eBZTag
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
You need this for the suction mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
Scanner for ATC: Yupiteru MVT-7300
Recorder for ATC: Olympus VN-741PC http://amzn.to/2fb4Lab

Would you like to view my full flight videos ahead of everyone else, and support inflight Video at the same time?  Please consider supporting me on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/inflightvideo.  Patrons get early access to all of my full length, full flight videos, as well as other perks including access to giveaways, freebies, and regular live chats to talk about what's coming soon for inflight Video!  You'll also be supporting me by allowing me to reserve seats with a good view, and access a wider range of interesting flights to film.  Thank you!
